articles.title: ‘We’re in a space race’: Nasa sounds alarm at Chinese designs on moon - The Guardian
articles.description: Administrator Bill Nelson says Beijing could seek ‘own’ resource-rich areas and next two years could be key to US-China contest
articles.content:
The US is locked in a space race with China and the country needs to watch out that its rival does not gain a foothold and try to dominate lunar resources, Nasas top official has warned.

articles.title: Stunning global picture of Earth taken by a NASA satellite - Daily Mail
articles.description: The image was taken by a recently launched US space agency satellite, NOAA-21, which experts hope will provide vital information about our planet's oceans, atmosphere and land.
articles.content:
It is a striking image of our planet that captures everything from the bright blue hue of the Caribbean Sea to the dense smog above northern India.

articles.author: Sam Tonkin
articles.title: Stargazers will have a chance to see a new comet at the end of January - Daily Mail
articles.description: C/2022 E3 (ZTF) was discovered in March last year while inside Jupiter's orbit, and will make its closest approach to the sun on January 12 and Earth on February 2.
articles.content:
It's not often that stargazers get the opportunity to spot a comet with the naked eye.
But at the end of this month or possibly the start of February  a newly-discovered space rock will whizz by our… [+5794 chars]

articles.title: Asteroid danger on New Year! Two GIANT asteroids nearing Earth today; here's what NASA says - HT Tech
articles.description: Two giant asteroids are rushing towards Earth today. One is 72 feet, while the size of the other asteroid is 48 feet. Know what NASA revealed.
articles.content: Not all near-Earth objects pose a threat to the planet. However, when the size of the objects are large and they come very close to Earth, they raise a concern. It can be known that near-Earth object… [+1688 chars]
